name: Eldoris
body:
### Welcome to Eldoris Team.
We are a Subs in Schools team from The Heights School competing in the 2020 Subs in Schools challenge. We will be posting our details and regular updates of our rov on this website feel free to check out what we do.

### What Do We Do?
We are making a Remote operated Vehicle (Rov) which is usually used in deep sea exploration. To do this we are a team of six we have the main engineers, marketing team and the production line. Each of these lines play a key role in making the Rov. We must ensure to work as a team and collaborate.

### Meet Our Team 
Meet the team!
1. Krish Patel - is a Team Manager his role is to ensure that all the deadline are met on time.

2. Mehtaab Singh - is the Marketing Manager his roles is to ensure that the sponsors are ready and the website your on

3. Gokul Sunil Nair - is the Resource Manager his role is to order in the necessary parts for the manufacturing of the Rov.

4. Harneet Singh - production Manager he has to ensure that the production is working smoothly 

5. Areeb Nasir - production quality check - he ensures that our standards are up to quality.

6. Zayne Henderson - is the CAAD Manager who makes all the CAAD Files and 3D prints parts 

### Our Sponsors

1. SAAB 

2. Visual Connections

3. ASC (Australian Submarine Corporation)

4. REA (Re Engineering Australia)

### Contact us at 

- eldorismarketing@gmail.com
- The Heights School

### Follow us on our Social Media 
[Instagram ](https://www.instagram.com/ths.eldoris/)
